ygData.subject: RE: Wakishi quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, Arlena is the main reason I thought it was bad. And the fact that there s already another quest, verified to work, which is much harder than the
ygData.messageBody:
> It can't hurt. Let us know! =) Also if you ever manage to find Arlena and
> give Grimlot her bones instead of the lute of the gypsy princess, would be
> interesting to know what that quest gives. Another reason I doubt Grimlot
> has anything to do with the Wakizishi or the Lute is because he mentions
> Arlena, and she is not who carries the lute. just thought of that. anyway,
> good luck.

Yeah, Arlena is the main reason I thought it was bad. And the fact that
there's already another quest, verified to work, which is much harder than
the lute->grimrot quest, that gives a wakizashi.

And to rephrase more clearly what I said in the previous message.. if
you're going to disprove something, might as well do it right. =)
